tool_description: ProspectLens: Submit a domain name and unlock a wealth of comprehensive information about the corresponding company. This service extracts detailed insights commonly found on platforms such as Crunchbase, LinkedIn and Semrush, including funding data, website traffic analysis, founder profiles, social media links, and more. Please refer to the 'About' section for full documentation.
name: Website Intelligence
title: Website Intelligence

api_list.name: /extract-metadata
api_list.description: Scrapes website itself and extracts meta tags, og image, and favicon.

api_list.name: /public-email-domains
api_list.description: List of public email domains. Useful when you want to filter-out emails by public domains to avoid spending your API quota on this verification.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://website-intelligence.p.rapidapi.com/public-email-domains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "website-intelligence.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://website-intelligence.p.rapidapi.com/public-email-domains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "website-intelligence.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /lookup-google
api_list.description: Lookup details by domain, via Google. Returns a list of most relevant results which should give a good idea about the company. Especially useful if /lookup failed to return any data.

api_list.name: /lookup-domain-authority
api_list.description: Lookup domain authority score. Similar to moz.com data. Authority is a relative value from 0 to 100.

api_list.name: /is-public-email-domain
api_list.description: Check a domain to see if it is a public email domain. Returns bool. The endpoint is useful when you want to check one particular hostname extracted from an email address of a potential lead, to better understand if it is a company email or a public domain email. `/lookup` already contains this info in `.info.is_public_email_domain`

api_list.name: /lookup-linkedin
/lookup-all
api_list.description: Endpoint which retrieves and aggregates data typically found on Linkedin, Crunchbase, and website itself (meta tags and favicon)

api_list.name: /lookup
api_list.description: Returns Crunchbase-like API data by a domain name of a company
